isIn: {property} is not in the list of allowed values
arrayNotEmpty: {property} should not be an empty array
iana_language_must_be_lowercase: IANA language tag must be lowercase, but '{tag}' is not
invalid_context_code: Invalid context code: '{context}'. The context code must be valid IETF language tag (BCP 47).
invalid_key_type: Identification key type '{key}' is not registered with the namespace '{namespace}'
qualifier_not_found: Qualifier with AI or shortcode '{aiOrShortcode}' not found
qualifier_not_part_of_primary: Qualifier with AI or shortcode '{aiOrShortcode}' is not listed in any primary identifier's qualifiers array
qualifier_must_not_have_qualifiers: Qualifier with AI or shortcode'{aiOrShortcode}' cannot have its own qualifiers
data_attribute_must_not_have_qualifiers: Data attribute with AI or shortcode '{aiOrShortcode}' cannot have its own qualifiers
duplicate_identifier: Duplicate identifier with AI or shortcode '{aiOrShortcode}'
invalid_key: Identification key '{key}' does not match regex '{regex}'
unauthorized: Unauthorized: Please provide a valid token
not_found_qualifier: Namespace '{namespace}' does not have the qualifiers
invalid_qualifier_value: Qualifier value '{value}' does not match regex '{regex}'
qualifier_not_in_primary_ai: Qualifier '{qualifier}' not found in the primary application identifier {shortcode} ({ai})
